languages.text: Сквозь хрипы и кашель Лорд-капитан начинает цитировать многочисленные кодексы, заветы которых должны исполняться каждым имперцем. Торжественные слова наполнены призывом к соблюдения священного долга — до конца.

traits.locale_text: Сквозь хрипы и кашель Лорд-капитан начинает цитировать многочисленные кодексы, заветы которых должны исполняться каждым имперцем. Торжественные слова наполнены призывом к соблюдения священного долга — до конца.

languages.text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.
languages.original_text: Сквозь хрипы и кашель Лорд-капитан начинает цитировать многочисленные кодексы, заветы которых должны исполняться каждым имперцем. Торжественные слова наполнены призывом к соблюдения священного долга — до конца.

traits.locale_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfill their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfill their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

languages.text: Entre toses y jadeos, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} empieza a citar diversos códices cuyos mandamientos deben obedecer todos los hombres, mujeres y niños del Imperium. Sus solemnes palabras son un llamamiento a cumplir el deber sagrado hasta el amargo final.
languages.original_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

traits.locale_text: Entre toses y jadeos, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} empieza a citar diversos códices cuyos mandamientos deben obedecer todos los hombres, mujeres y niños del Imperium. Sus solemnes palabras son un llamamiento a cumplir el deber sagrado hasta el amargo final.

languages.text: 在喘息与咳嗽声中，领主舰长开始援引帝国的诸多法典，宣称帝国的每位男性、女性与孩子都必须遵守帝国的律法。{mf|他|她}的话语中充满了庄严的意味，决心履行神圣职责的召唤，至死不渝。
languages.original_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

traits.locale_text: 在喘息与咳嗽声中，领主舰长开始援引帝国的诸多法典，宣称帝国的每位男性、女性与孩子都必须遵守帝国的律法。{mf|他|她}的话语中充满了庄严的意味，决心履行神圣职责的召唤，至死不渝。

languages.text: ゼェゼェと咳き込みながら、ロード・キャプテンは帝国内のすべての老若男女がその戒めに従うべき数多くの法典を引用し始める。その厳粛な言葉は、神聖なる義務を死ねども果たそうという呼びかけが込められていた。
languages.original_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

traits.locale_text: ゼェゼェと咳き込みながら、ロード・キャプテンは帝国内のすべての老若男女がその戒めに従うべき数多くの法典を引用し始める。その厳粛な言葉は、神聖なる義務を死ねども果たそうという呼びかけが込められていた。

languages.text: Durch das Keuchen und Husten hindurch beginnt der Lord Captain zahlreiche Kodizes zu zitieren, deren Gebote von jedem Mann, jeder Frau und jedem Kind im Imperium befolgt werden müssen. Die feierlichen Worte sind erfüllt von der Aufforderung, ihre heilige Pflicht zu erfüllen ... bis zum bitteren Ende.
languages.original_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

languages.text: Luttant pour respirer et réprimer des quintes de toux, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} commence à citer plusieurs codex dont les commandements doivent être suivis par les hommes, femmes et enfants de l'Imperium sans exception. Ses paroles solennelles exhortent les officiers à accomplir leur devoir sacré jusqu'à leur dernier souffle.
languages.original_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

traits.locale_text: Luttant pour respirer et réprimer des quintes de toux, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} commence à citer plusieurs codex dont les commandements doivent être suivis par les hommes, femmes et enfants de l'Imperium sans exception. Ses paroles solennelles exhortent les officiers à accomplir leur devoir sacré jusqu'à leur dernier souffle.

languages.text: Hırıltılarla ve öksürükle boğuşan Lord Kaptan, İmparatorluk'taki her erkek, kadın ve çocuğun içlerinde yazan emirlere itimat etmesi gereken pek çok yazmadan alıntı yapmaya başlıyor. Ciddiyet dolu sözleri, kutsal görevlerini ölene kadar yerine getirmeleri gerektiğini söyleyen bir çağrıya dönüşüyor.
languages.original_text: Through the wheezes and coughs, the Lord Captain begins to quote numerous codices, whose commandments must be followed by every man, woman, and child in the Imperium. {mf|His|Her} solemn words are filled with a call to fulfil their sacred duty — to the bitter end.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, hırıltılar ve öksürükler eşliğinde, emirlerine İmparatorluk'taki her erkek, kadın ve çocuğun itimat etmesi gereken pek çok yazmadan alıntı yapmaya başlıyor. Ciddiyet dolu sözleri, kutsal görevlerini ölene kadar yerine getirmeleri gerektiğini söyleyen bir çağrıya dönüşüyor.
